DOC.brief_summary: The human immune system produce protein call hCAP18 ( also know LL-37 cathelicidin ) . This protein believe help body fight infection . Studies suggest vitamin D may important production hCAP18 . This study design test ability two different form vitamin D affect level hCAP18 . Vitamin D hCAP18 level measure initial visit . Individuals vitamin D deficient randomly assign receive one two form vitamin D two week . After , follow-up level measure .
